answerText: Look Back in Anger[10] Look Back in Anger was written by John Osborne, who was a member of this movement along with John Braine and Kingsley Amis.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 7 | 10 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: It ends with its female lead collapsing, begging for forgiveness from her husband after she states that losing her baby has caused her to re-evaluate her life. [10] Name this play which begins with Jimmy Porter vacuously insulting his wife Alison and their friend Cliff.
